title: Search warrants are executed at Trumbull wells
teaser: Federal and state agents served search warrants on a northeast Ohio disposal well site late Tuesday. The operation is near a wetlands area of Trumbull County where contamination was found at the beginning of the month.Â  WKSU's Tim Rudell reports. WKSU's Tim Rudell reports.
